titleStmt.title: Nine sermons heretofore preached upon severall occasions, and printed 1636. and now published. without any alteration 1641. By John Prideaux doctor of divinity regius professor, and rector of Exeter Colledge
titleStmt.author: Prideaux, John, 1578-1650.
Prideaux, John, 1578-1650. Christs counsell for ending lavv cases.
Prideaux, John, 1578-1650. Ephesus backsliding: considered and applied to these times.
Prideaux, John, 1578-1650. Christians free-will offering.
Prideaux, John, 1578-1650. Gowries Conspiracie.
Prideaux, John, 1578-1650. Higgaion & Selah: for the discovery of the powder-plot.
Prideaux, John, 1578-1650. Hezekiahs sicknesse and recovery.
Prideaux, John, 1578-1650. Perez-vzzah. Or the breach of vzzah.
Prideaux, John, 1578-1650. Sermon preached on the fifth of October 1624. at the consecration of St James Chappell in Exceter Colledge.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Leonard Lichfield printer to the University, & are to be sold by Henry Cripps & Henry Curteyne,

notesStmt.note: Each sermon with a separate title page and pagination. Signatures are continuous.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
